song.title: Alien Nations 2 - Forest Hymn v3
song.info:
Kyd was contacted on 2012-01-25 about this song and all other songs which currently are on necta as of 2012-01-25 and they are allowed to be here. - Elrinth
You can still buy The Nations CD with the German title Die Volker which can be bought from Amazon UK here: [url]http://www.amazon.co.uk/Die-Volker-2-Jesper-Kyd/dp/B00005M1EK[/url]
and Amazon Germany here: [url]http://www.amazon.co.uk/Die-Volker-2-Jesper-Kyd/dp/B00005M1EK[/url]
From the album [url=http://www.lynnemusic.com/jesper_kyd-the_nations.html]The Nations: Alien Nations 2[/url]
